cast.name: 布莱恩·纳雷尔 Brian Narelle

this_title: Let There Be Light: The Odyssey of Dark Star
introduction: Exploring the controversial story behind John Carpenter (Halloween & The Thing) and writer Dan O Bannon's (Alien & Return of the Living Dead) from first feature film. From its humble beginnings as a USC student film, to its modern day status as a cult masterpiece. It also offers a rare glimpse inside the creative minds of two USC film students... who would eventually go on to change the way horror films are made. Written by Daniel Griffith
foreign_title: Let There Be Light: The Odyssey of Dark Star
